attributes.action: Have all NHS hospital staff tested for high temperature every day re. COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Testing for high temperature (an early symptom of COVID-19 virus), has been used with great effectiveness in China and South Korea to then test for COVID-19 those with high temperatures and if COVID-19 positive to isolate them in special centres NOT self-isolate at home.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests and the health and safety of NHS staff are clinical and operational matters for which the NHS is responsible, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
